title: The apology of Iohan Bale agaynste a ranke papyst anuswering both hym and hys doctours, that neyther their vowes nor yet their priesthode areof the Gospell, but of Antichrist. Anno Do. M.CCCCC.L. A brefe exposycyon also upo[n] the .xxx chaptre of Numerii, which was the first occasion of thys present varyaunce. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.
publicationStmtPublisher: By [S. Mierdman for] Ihon Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate. These bokes are to be sold at his shop, by the lytle Conduit in Chepe syde,
